statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 4 , 3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , 3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 1 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 , 4 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
